sentence: the door's open in the cupboard .
and there's a cookie jar and a little boy on a stool .
and he's tryin(g) to reach the cookies .
and the stool is going to go .
and his sister's tryin(g) to help him .
and his mother is lookin(g) out the window .
and she's lettin(g) her water run down the sink .
and the boy is going to be hurt .
